identityName.label: Identity Name
identityName.hint: It will be used only to list the Identity into your wallet. Nobody else will see it.

welcom.label: Welcome!
welcom.title: Issue your Digital ID!
welcom.why: There is no any digital ID in your wallet. Let's issue one to make you able to issue and sign other documents (credentials).
welcom.note: The ID is just an identification sequence that you create for yourself. It allows to prove your ownership of a document (credential), but not to trace you back.

oppotunities.title: Capabilities of Digital ID:
oppotunities.op1: You issue it secretly for yourself — so it's absulutely private.
oppotunities.op2: The use of digital ID doesn't allow to trace back your identity until you want to.
oppotunities.op3: It doesn't require any of your pivate data, but it's based on your private key from this wallet.
oppotunities.op4: It allows to prove ownership of different documents (credentials).
oppotunities.op5: You can create and use multiple IDs for different purposes.

finish.label: Congratulations!
finish.title: You have a Digital Identity
finish.congratulation: Now you can create and sign credentials via your wallet!
